duties_responsibilities.duty: Enter prescription information, patient searches, prescriber searches, drug selection, prescription interpretation, insurance billing, and basic documentation.
Accept customer and prescription information for new and refill prescriptions, including refill authorization from doctor offices.
Retrieve medication, create prescription labels, place medication into prescription containers, complete paperwork, and input customer and prescription data into the computer.
Assist with maintaining the Pharmacy department by keeping it clean and in order, assist in inventory management processes, and administer Rite Aid programs.
Work weekdays, weekends, evening shifts, and some holidays, and maintain a friendly and team-oriented attitude.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or General Education Degree (GED)
